description: Identify the cause of death with the highest number of deaths.
Calculate the total number of deaths from all causes combined.
Find the cause of death with the lowest number of deaths.
Determine if there is a significant difference in the number of deaths between neoplasms and diseases of the circulatory system.
What is the range of the number of deaths across all causes?
Order the causes of death from the highest to the lowest number of deaths.
Identify any clusters of causes of death with similar numbers of deaths.
What percentage of deaths are caused by neoplasms?
Determine the number of deaths caused by mental and behavioural disorders.
Find any causes of death that have a significantly lower number of deaths compared to the majority.
